name: Sweet and Salty Snack Mix
author: MARGARET N
summary: This snack mix has been a family favorite for over 20 years. It's the perfect combination of sweet, salty, and crunchy. It's sure to please the whole crowd with no corn syrup and no hot oven! This makes a great gift for the holidays and also freezes really well.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package crispy corn and rice cereal
1 cup sweetened flaked coconut, or more to taste
directions: Place cereal, pecans, almonds, cashews, coconut, and raisins in a large brown paper bag or large microwave-safe bowl and stir or shake to mix
Melt 1 stick plus 3 tablespoons butter, brown sugar, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat
Bring to a boil; simmer until thickened, about 5 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract
Pour over the cereal mixture and stir to coat
Microwave on high in three 90-second intervals, stirring between intervals, 4 1/2 minutes total
Spread out to cool before breaking apart
